item.title: 观看直播：ABC 新闻直播间提供当天的头条新闻和最新报道，现在即可观看。
item.description:
WATCH LIVE: ABC News Live has the day's top stories and up-to-the-minute reports, streaming now. https://t.co/OvoDsmyh5d

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 在 2024 年奥斯卡颁奖典礼之前，将第四次主持颁奖典礼的吉米-基梅尔（Jimmy Kimmel）与 @GMA 坐在一起，讨论了围绕好莱坞最盛大夜晚的各种细节。
item.description:
Ahead of the 2024 Oscars, Jimmy Kimmel, who will be hosting the awards show for the fourth time, sat down with @GMA to discuss the details surrounding Hollywood's biggest night. https://t.co/smHuJu6DHe

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 42 岁的布里特是有史以来最年轻的共和党参议员。近几个月来，这位阿拉巴马州人已成为党内的新面孔，领导层迫切希望突出她在年轻保守派运动中的前沿地位：
item.description:
At 42, Britt is the youngest Republican woman ever elected to the Senate. The Alabama native has in recent months become an emerging face of her party, with leadership eager to highlight her position at the forefront of the young conservative movement: https://t.co/bqHHxp3NCt

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 1965年，民权示威者在阿拉巴马州塞尔玛的埃德蒙-佩特斯桥（Edmund Pettus Bridge）举行游行，遭到州警和治安官的暴力驱散，这就是著名的 "血色星期天"。
item.description:
ON THIS DAY: In 1965, a march by civil rights demonstrators was violently broken up at the Edmund Pettus Bridge in Selma, Alabama, by state troopers and a sheriff’s posse in what became known as “Bloody Sunday.” https://t.co/1KhXnvgydX pic.twitter.com/C0pxhXq6EE

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 去年在缅因州路易斯顿大规模枪击案中造成 18 人死亡的罗伯特-卡德 "很可能 "患有脑外伤，根据研究其大脑的医生的报告，卡德的家人公布了这份报告。
item.description:
Robert Card, the man who killed 18 in the Lewiston, Maine mass shooting last year, “likely” suffered from traumatic brain injury, according to a report by doctors who studied his brain, and released by Card’s family.https://t.co/MvKo3atHDs

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统预计将在国情咨文演讲中用很大篇幅阐述经济问题，他将再次呼吁增加对企业和亿万富翁的税收，并强调美国自他就任总统以来的经济反弹。
item.description:
Pres. Biden is expected to spend a large part of his State of the Union speech addressing the economy as he renews calls for increased taxes on corporations, billionaires and highlighting the economic rebound the U.S. has had since he became president.https://t.co/tkLJAGucQV

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 阿什利-莫森特（Ashleigh Merchant）律师推动取消富尔顿县检察官法尼-威利斯（Fani Willis）在佐治亚州干涉选举案中的资格，她周三在佐治亚州参议院小组作证。
item.description:
Lawyer Ashleigh Merchant, who is pushing to disqualify Fulton County DA Fani Willis from the Georgia election interference case, testified before a Georgia Senate panel Wednesday.https://t.co/Wpo1nnmsbW

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 国情咨文是宪法规定的总统传统，不应该是竞选演说，现在 2024 年大选正如火如荼地进行，这是拜登为自己连任辩护的重要机会：
item.description:
The State of the Union address is a constitutionally-mandated tradition of the presidency, and not supposed to be a campaign speech, with the 2024 election now in full swing, it's a key opportunity for Biden to make his case for a second term: https://t.co/8acZK7Meot

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 美国联邦卫生官员周三表示，美国一些折扣零售商出售的肉桂碎含有大量铅，应予以丢弃。
item.description:
Ground cinnamon sold by some U.S. discount retailers is contaminated with high levels of lead and should be discarded, federal health officials said Wednesday. https://t.co/4uAQ8fl36b pic.twitter.com/T1JjUtNAVp

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 帕米生日演员珍娜-费舍尔（Jenna Fischer）今天 50 岁了。
item.description:
PAMMY BIRTHDAY: Actor Jenna Fischer is 50 today. https://t.co/iSmmEMgQvG pic.twitter.com/p44mTyGmLB

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 警方称，正在搜捕一名 27 岁的男子，他涉嫌在马萨诸塞州一辆停放的汽车内枪杀了一位母亲和她年幼的女儿：
item.description:
A manhunt is on for a 27-year-old man who is suspected of shooting and killing a mother and her young daughter inside of a parked car in Massachusetts, police say:https://t.co/NrklbnY2N8

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 最新消息随着最新谈判的结束，斋月前不可能达成加沙停火协议：
item.description:

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 得克萨斯州当局正在寻找一名大学生神秘失踪案的线索，据其家人说，他是在本周早些时候带狗外出后失踪的。
item.description:
Authorities in Texas are searching for clues in the mysterious disappearance of a college student whose family said he went missing after taking his dog out earlier this week. https://t.co/ARS14mdGgK

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 印第安纳州一位母亲的家人和朋友说，他们对这位母亲上周从多米尼加共和国乘坐航班度假归来时突然死亡感到震惊。
item.description:
Family and friends of an Indiana mother said they were stunned by her sudden death as she returned from vacation last week aboard a flight from the Dominican Republic. https://t.co/MDTGTlhvgt pic.twitter.com/DVM9xdg80P

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 一名墨西哥公民因在过境美国时企图用汽车走私两只活嚎叫猴而被捕：
item.description:
A Mexican citizen has been arrested for attempting to smuggle two live howler monkeys in his vehicle while crossing over into the U.S.

Read more: https://t.co/eHfXpJTM2m pic.twitter.com/bRLpCO9h4O

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 据贝克萨县警长办公室称，得克萨斯州的一位母亲在为儿子的恶霸制作饮料后将其送往医院，现已被逮捕：
item.description:
A Texas mother has been arrested after a drink she made for her son's bully sent him to the hospital, according to the Bexar County Sheriff's Office.

Read more: https://t.co/wTwETbVb0S pic.twitter.com/K5nLPWy8WA

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 塔吉特宣布将于下月开始实施一项付费会员计划，推出与竞争对手亚马逊和沃尔玛类似的订阅服务。以下是需要了解的信息：
item.description:
Target has announced a paid membership program set to begin next month, launching a subscription service similar to those on offer at competitors Amazon and Walmart.

Here's what to know: https://t.co/DOnEkdNUfP

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 春天向前走 "这句话早在幼儿园就已经教过了，但这个概念仍然让许多成年人感到困惑。但为什么我们要在每年春天把时钟拨快？
item.description:
'Spring forward' is a phrase taught as early as kindergarten, but a concept that still stumps many adults.

Years of debate and two world wars have followed the age-old tradition. But why do we set our clocks forward each spring?https://t.co/Y51xFEe2F6 pic.twitter.com/HeQrHrHLso

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 根据新的研究，美国一些沿海城市正在 "消失 "在地面上，这可能会在不久的将来进一步加剧海平面上升的复杂性。
item.description:
Several coastal cities around the United States are "disappearing" into the ground, according to new research — which could further exacerbate complications of sea level rise in the near future. https://t.co/inaDtjAmZ7 pic.twitter.com/6LK3JWGgzO

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 据贝克萨县警长办公室称，得克萨斯州的一位母亲在为儿子的恶霸制作饮料并将其送往医院后被捕。
item.description:
A Texas mother has been arrested after a drink she made for her son's bully sent him to the hospital, according to the Bexar County Sheriff's Office. https://t.co/87CiCzN2sU

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 研究显示，四名先天性艾滋病病毒感染儿童在暂停接受艾滋病药物治疗一年多后，仍能保持无病毒状态。
item.description:
Four children born with HIV were able to live virus-free for more than a year after their HIV medication was paused, study shows. https://t.co/xQp9PHViwY

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 一名墨西哥公民因在过境美国时企图用汽车偷运两只活嚎叫猴而被捕。
item.description:
A Mexican citizen has been arrested for attempting to smuggle two live howler monkeys in his vehicle while crossing over into the U.S. https://t.co/Rmk0lU0YaG

item.title: 芭比娃娃就要 65 岁了！为了庆祝这个标志性娃娃即将到来的里程碑式生日，美泰将推出一款灵感源自 1959 年原版的新娃娃。新娃娃的服装和配饰向原版娃娃深受喜爱的泳装造型的复古风格致敬。
item.description:
Barbie is turning 65!

To celebrate the iconic doll's upcoming milestone birthday, Mattel is releasing a new doll inspired by the 1959 original. The new doll's ensemble and accessories are a nod to the retro style of the original's beloved swimsuit look. https://t.co/tk0C2dgjSb pic.twitter.com/oN02wDarR5

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 本周，宾夕法尼亚州一名妇女被一只母熊带着幼崽咬伤后住院，她在病床上讲述了这起无耻的动物袭击事件：
item.description:
A Pennsylvania woman was hospitalized after being mauled by a mother bear with her cubs this week and is recounting the brazen animal attack from her hospital bed.

More here: https://t.co/4vZw9ZxNKM pic.twitter.com/8ZnKhtPr1n

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 根据哥白尼的一份新报告，地球已连续九个月打破最热月记录。全球大部分海洋的海面温度仍处于前所未有的水平。
item.description:
Planet Earth has now broken warmest-month records for nine months in a row, according to a new report by Copernicus.

Global sea surface temperatures across a majority of the world’s oceans remain at unprecedented levels.https://t.co/zmcDBpGr14 pic.twitter.com/HD5xrR2l6q

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 纽约州州长凯西-霍楚尔（Kathy Hochul）周三表示，纽约国民警卫队和纽约州警察将被部署到纽约市地铁系统，以帮助乘客在交通犯罪激增后获得安全感。
item.description:
New York National Guard troops and New York State Police troopers will be deployed into the NYC subway system to help riders feel safe after a spike in transit crime, Gov. Kathy Hochul said Wednesday. https://t.co/xgIVOxepjZ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: "拜登总统在周三的一份声明中说："唐纳德-特朗普明确表示，他不想要尼基-海利的支持者。"拜登总统在周三的声明中说："我想明确一点：他们在我的竞选活动中占有一席之地。
item.description:
"Donald Trump made it clear he doesn't want Nikki Haley's supporters," Pres. Biden said in a statement on Wednesday. "I want to be clear: There is a place for them in my campaign." https://t.co/uCUzDlxsZZ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 研究人员说，最近在马萨诸塞州的南塔克特岛海岸发现了一头灰鲸，该物种被认为在大西洋灭绝已有 200 年之久。
item.description:
A gray whale, whose species has been considered extinct in the Atlantic Ocean for 200 years, was recently spotted off the coast of Nantucket, an Island in Massachusetts, researchers say. https://t.co/rhOdGR5jWY

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 据美国国家运输安全委员会（National Transportation Safety Board）的一名官员称，周一晚上，一架单引擎飞机在飞行员报告发动机完全失去动力后坠毁在田纳西州纳什维尔的一条高速公路上，造成包括三名儿童在内的五人死亡。
item.description:
Five people, including three children, died when a single-engine plane crashed into a Nashville, Tennessee, highway after the pilot reported a total loss of engine power on Monday night, according to a National Transportation Safety Board official.https://t.co/flDXjJTyh7 pic.twitter.com/FxdBxocmpJ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 美国国务院鼓励美国公民在帮派暴力事件不断发生后离开海地。
item.description:
The U.S. State Department is encouraging American citizens to leave Haiti following an ongoing spate of gang violence.https://t.co/noGhMe0xgg

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024
